message: animate with CSS3 and fallback to jQuery :) nice plugin for animating in old browsers and take advantage of new browsers.
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: jQuery Animations with automatic CSS3 transitions when possible
caption: playground.benbarnett.net
description: Note that any properties not mentioned above will simply be handled by the standard jQuery $.animate() method. This plugin adds new functionality without taking any away. Requires jQuery 1.3.2+
